item.description:
RTâ€‚cohere
Tomorrow marks the beginning of the Cohere x @NYSE hackathon. Thanks to the NYSE for collaborating with us and with our AI partners at @weaviate_io, @LangChainAI, and @lablabai for their contributions to the event. We can't wait to see the innovative projects that will come out!

Good reference architecture for a banking agent app by @McKinsey / @iguazio for:

item.title: While the space is still new, we're starting to see a few common patterns and trends emerge, especially around RAG We've teamed up with our friends at...
item.description:
While the space is still new, we're starting to see a few common patterns and trends emerge, especially around RAG

We've teamed up with our friends at @DataStax to try to codify some of them!


DataStax:â€‚Your guide to LLM agent reference architecture is here! ğŸ“ğŸ—º We teamed up with @LangChainAI to provide:

â—† Common Gen AI design patterns and use cases
â—† In-depth architectural examples
â—† Important considerations to keep in mind

Grab your copy â¡ï¸https://dtsx.io/3vP8hiP

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: Some fun updates to OpenGPTs! Add 3 different "cognitive architectures": - Assistant - RAG - Chatbot We have a simple hosted versio...
item.description:
RTâ€‚Harrison Chase
Some fun updates to OpenGPTs!

Add 3 different "cognitive architectures":

- Assistant
- RAG
- Chatbot

We have a simple hosted version ("research preview") to play around with here: https://opengpts-example-vz4y4ooboq-uc.a.run.app/


LangChain:â€‚ğŸ¦œğŸ¤–OpenGPTs Updates

Some big updates to OpenGPTs!

â­ï¸Reminder: OpenGPTs is an open source version of the GPT store where you can fully control the model used, the tools used, the retrieval strategy

Blog + YouTube to dive into more detail!

â“What are the updates?

ğŸ•¸ï¸LangGraph:â€¦

RTâ€‚Jacob Lee
Excited to get more devs building with the @CloudflareDev â›…ï¸ + @LangChainAI JS/TS ğŸ¦œğŸ”—!

There's even a full example RAG app that serves a @nuxt_js + @vuejs app entirely from a Cloudflare Worker.

Ingest into Vectorize included! See the blog for more:

https://blog.cloudflare.com/langchain-support-for-workers-ai-vectorize-and-d1/


Ricky:â€‚If you're building AI applications with @LangChainAI (and you should be!), it's now even easier to integrate with @CloudflareDev Workers AI, Vectorize and D1! ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ğŸ‰
